alert.note: Alert for Saginaw; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:25PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tuscola and east central Saginaw Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 523 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Birch Run, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Tuscola and east central Saginaw Counties, including the following locations... Frankenmuth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
